metadata.title: netty: SniHandler 16MB allocation leads to OOM (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Netty's SniHandler while navigating TLS handshake which may permit a large heap allocation if the handler did not have a timeout configured. This issue may allow an attacker to send a client hello packet which would cause the server to buffer large amounts of data per connection, potentially causing an out of memory error, resulting in Denial of Service. 
            
            MITIGATION: Configuration of SniHandler with an idle timeout will mitigate this issue.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
netty is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
